Posts.Content: Jun 20, 2015 08:38PM halee wrote: tshire -- I had 3 lymph nodes removed. I developed cording within 2 weeks, and just this last week was diagnosed with lymphedema. It's mild so far, and will hopefully stay that way, but it is a risk no matter how many nodes you have removed. My doctors said sentinel node (removing 1-3 nodes) has a 5% lymphedema rate and axillary 20%.
Posts.Title: difficult decisions- types of BMX surgery, experiences tshire MsVeryDenseBreasts
